div.bibl: Novi Svijet Vol. IV, No. 9, Sept. 30, 1926. FIFTEENTH ANNIVERSARY CELEBRATION

body.p: The Croatian "Sokol" on the West Side of Chicago is celebrating its 15th anniversary and 30th public appearance, which will be held Sunday, November 24, 1926, in Pilsen Sokol Hall, 1814 S. Ashland Avenue.
The entertainment committee has arranged a very interesting program, which will be announced later.
The celebration starts with a program at 3 P. M., and "Sokol" calisthenics at 7:30 P. M.
The committee guarantees a pleasant evening for all.
